relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
I do feel safe here, and if anything happens around the campus, I get text messages and emails letting me know.
Just like cafeteria food. But there are restaurants around that very easy to get to. They are in walking distance which is great.
I really enjoy attending school here. There are friendly and helpful instructors and advisers who are willing to sit down and assist you with anything. I would give this school a 9/10!!

textAfterTable: Login to rate or flag the reviews Anna from Chaparral, NM 12/17/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 2 of 30 Categories Comments Great for these types of students This school has great programs for disabled students. Tips for prospective students Don't fall behind, come on if you're in college just keep going until you get to your goal. Bang for the buck Tuition is decent, no complains. Am enjoying being here I enjoy the ambient from this school. People are very nice and sociable, also it's not hard to get around the school. Am learning a lot All the teachers focus on each individual student. I you have any questions or concerns each teacher is attentive to give you an answer right away. Classrooms are quite small but
